extendedInfo.description: Colorful time-twisting casual RPG, Elphis Adventure! Enjoy the full story for FREE~Red Riding Hood + Jeanne d'Arc + Liu Bei = Elphis?!Crazy yet intriguing! Scenario definitely differentiated from other time-traveling stories.Roam inside fairytales, historical times, and other fantasy periods in Com2uS' casual RPG ""Elphis : Adventure""!!Lalala~ Another peaceful day for Red Riding Hood, and her Granny tells her to bring back some apples. But when she came back home.... Granny's gone?!?! Search for Granny by traveling through time, and find out who or what took her away!Creepy monsters, colorful graphics, and easy controls~ As one of Google Playâs best casual RPG, Elphis can be enjoyed by anyoneAnd now... shall we start the time machine?â Features â- Little Red Riding Hood and her time-twisting adventure! Fairytales, historical periods! Fall into different times and dimensions to explore a journey with more challenges. Uncover the villain's hidden schemes and get indulged in a story you will never forget!- Endless Fun, Endless Combos!Elphis's specially optimized unlimited combo system! Unlimited super combos! Hit again and again to get stronger hits! Combo aggro skills will get you more powerful hits for maximum satisfaction.- Learn Skills! Get more power!Petite in size but Red Riding Hood holds so many skills! Elphis features Star-falling 'meteors', attractive allurement 'lures', wind-spinning 'storms', and more awesome skills. Get all the fantastic passive and active skills!- Infinite DungeonNever-ending plays even when you see the ending! Various bosses and missions, special items hidden here and there in Infinite-Dungeon!- Character Level-ups with other customized features!Tired of Red Riding Hood being red all the time? Customize her look with different hats, capes, clothes and weapons however you want. Her power may increase with different looks!- Save to HubYou can save your save data to the Hub, and load it from another Android device with the game on it! Just remember, when you upload your save data, it deletes it in the original device. You can load it from the Hub on the original device to continue playing!ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.title: Fun & Addictive
reviews.comment: This is by far one of the best adventure game game I\'ve downloaded. I just wish the weapons enhancement section could be a bit more refined. I rather play with the swords and axe rather then the hammers.
reviews.author: Sam N

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: It\'s very cute!
reviews.author: Gio Lagrosa

reviews.title: Seriously outstanding
reviews.comment: This game is amazing... a super fun and unique twist on ^adventure^ so much fun! i could sit for hours
reviews.author: Veda Campbell

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: It\'s a great game, but I would love to play online with other player\'s. It would be better & more enjoyable. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Briland Thompson

reviews.title: Wowow
reviews.comment: Amazing game! Works great, smooth gameplay and fast loading when changing places
reviews.author: Winarti Iswin

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: This game was fun for the 3 minutes I was able to play until it shut down on me. Now it wont even open!
reviews.author: Vanessa Rodriguez

reviews.title: Need some fix!
reviews.comment: Good game,but I guess the d-pad control needs some fix. It stuck in one direction sometime..
reviews.author: Reinhart Angelbert Yanis

reviews.title: nice game
reviews.comment: i love it very much^^the character very cute and the story very creative
reviews.author: ka chen Ng

reviews.title: Cute but deadly
reviews.comment: The challenges it offers are amusing! I can\'t stop playing before I could beat the bosses
reviews.author: Nyccha Lucille

reviews.title: Fantastico!
reviews.comment: I really like it! It\'s really good and addicting.. I played for hours and hours but still exciting.. It freezes sometimes when I open but still good.. Good job lil bud!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cute
reviews.comment: this game is adorable and fun, a great combination! i give it 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excellent game I ever downloaded!
reviews.comment: Very nice game ;-)  But my character doesn\'t move, its probably overusing that game for an almost 8:45:03 hours nonstop .i\'m now lv.30 PLEASE FIX THAT PROBLEM AS SOON AS POSSIBLE!!!!!.i want to play :\'(
reviews.author: hokage yeun

reviews.title: Do it
reviews.comment: U r gud 4 nthng....try dis fusss...dnt think soo much jst say yes nd yes Dnt comment....do it
reviews.author: Prerna Singh

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: It\'s very entertaining and i love the boss fox\'s expression when i was fighting him OMG it took me forever to beat him until i came up with a strategy.
reviews.author: carra moore

reviews.title: Best RPG Ever
reviews.comment: I love this game... I\'ve never found an rpg game that is so cute, addicting and fun.. I\'ll never uninstall this. Please continue updating this app.. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Very good visual effect! the app won\'t crash, and the figures are so cute! Love it!  bt this game is really addictive, be careful not to be too stuck with the game, spend time wisely...
reviews.author: Kwok P N

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: The game is fun and cute, but the money drop is way to low. The monster can kill you in less than 4 hits even when they are the monsters you are suppost to train on and even if you are a few level higher than the monster, the monsters have no problem killing you in less than a few hits and I have no money to buy pot so I keep on dying and I cant do anything about it.
reviews.author: Oscar Zhang

reviews.title: Epic!
reviews.comment: WARNING! Highly addictive. Lol  edit: added one more star to make it 5 for the nice reply :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool and Addictive Game!
reviews.comment: Many gamers must try this game because of the gameplay and story. At first, it was difficult for me to understand the controls and items but because of the story, I got it. For me, it was 100% cool and addictive. =)
reviews.author: Jayvee Belber

reviews.title: Blank screen
reviews.comment: Unfortunately this game did not work on my Nexus 7; just a blank screen.
reviews.author: Cynthia Ma
